Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add WhatsApp notification system with Twilio integration

- Add WhatsApp notification service with Twilio API integration
- Create SendNotificationDialog component for sending notifications from UI
- Add Arabic notification templates for real estate scenarios
- Implement Saudi phone number auto-formatting (05x -> +966x)
- Add notification routes for test, payment reminder, contract expiry
- Add i18n support with Arabic/English translations
- Add user authentication with login/register pages
- Add user management for admin role
- Create edit dialogs for contracts and units
- Add language switcher component
- Update UI with modern styling and RTL support
